title: Sweet - Off The Record (Remaster)
description:
Off the Record is the fifth album by Sweet. It was recorded at Audio International Studios in London between October 1976 and January 1977. The band produced with assistance from engineers Louis Austin and Nick Ryan.

FLAC

Sweet

Off The Record

1977

CD - Artwork included






"Fever of Love" - 4:02
"Lost Angels" - 4:04
"Midnight to Daylight" - 3:32
"Windy City" - 7:30
"Live for Today" - 3:24
"She Gimme Lovin'" - 4:05
"Laura Lee" - 4:17
"Hard Times" - 4:02
"Funk It Up" - 3:36

plus bonus tracks
